feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.2
entry.content:
üß© Pieces

  • feat(gemini): add 2.5 flash and 2.5 pro models (#8403) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: publishing piece to npm through tools scripts (#8407) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add configurable pkce method support for oauth2 (#8144) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: lock mcps, agents and tables on limits exceeded (#8384) @Louai-Zokerburg

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Louai-Zokerburg, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @onyedikachi-david

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.3
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add platform operator role (#7911) @kamal

üß© Pieces

  • feat(wedof): update piece (#8318) @obenazouz-wedof
  • feat: ninox piece (#8356) @Sanket6652
  • feat: short-io piece (#8393) @aryel780
  • fix(piece.dimo): telemetry actions, typos (#8425) @yusuf-cirak
  • feat(dimo): add vehicle events actions (#8423) @yusuf-cirak
  • feat: clicksend piece (#8279) @sparkybug
  • fix(utility-ai): add missing auth header (#8419) @amrdb
  • feat: fireberry piece (#8395) @sparkybug
  • feat(HTTP): add binary body handling (#8012) @simonc

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: undefined limits arriving as 0 value from platform route (#8426) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: make discord notification sent if checkly report exists (#8421) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: column external id isn't used in tables actions/triggers in table releases (#8382) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: disable (Test Step) button while inputs like dropdown are still loading (#8414) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: chats were infinitely loading for people not logged in (#8412) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: connect checkly to github action and run e2e tests (#8416) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add trial gifting route (#8418) @Louai-Zokerburg

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Louai-Zokerburg, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @amrdb, @aryel780, @hazemadelkhalel, @kamal, @kishanprmr, @obenazouz-wedof, @onyedikachi-david, @simonc, @sparkybug and @yusuf-cirak

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.4
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: added alert in dashboard for AI credits (#8490) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üß© Pieces

  • feat: added tranlsations to multiple pieces (#8462) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(linear-piece): show only team-specific labels in Linear label dropdown (#8340) @ravikiranvm
  • feat(pdf): extract PDF pages and get page count actions (#8459) @danielpoonwj
  • feat(peekshot): capture screenshot action (#8339) @balwant1707
  • feat: smoove (#8435) @Sanket6652
  • feat: cloudinary (#8383) @Sanket6652
  • fix(dimo.piece): target_uri fix, naming conventions refactor (#8430) @yusuf-cirak
  • feat: increase scope for hubspot api (#8446) @Cloudieunnie
  • feat(placid): add complete Placid integration (#8361) @MAVRICK-1
  • feat(bamboohr): report-field-changed trigger (#8420) @Jeremie-Preault
  • feat: sendpulse piece (#8354) @aryel780
  • feat(eden-ai): improve piece metadata and bump version (#8449) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat: added needed permission to download captions for Youtube piece (#8448) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: quickbooks piece (#7524) @onyedikachi-david
  • feat(messagebird): dayjs usage for datetime fields and Custom API action (#8373) @prasanna2000-max
  • feat: eden-ai piece (#8427) @sparkybug

üêû Bug Fixes

  • feat: ai credits reset threshold (#8466) @Louai-Zokerburg
  • fix: analytics was showing random projects in the top projects by active flows section (#8463) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: testing chat inside the builder was making everything else unclickable + close chat on switching to another step (#8461) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: keyboard navigation between cells in Activepieces tables product (#8452) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: ai usage sqlite migration (#8450) @amrdb
  • fix: info route being called in CE (#8441) @Louai-Zokerburg

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • chore: made platform analytics load faster (#8378) @amrdb

üìö Documentation

  • chore(deps): bump form-data from 4.0.3 to 4.0.4 in /packages/pieces/community/scrapeless (#8458) @dependabot
  • docs: add ravikiranvm as a contributor for code (#8470) @allcontributors
  • docs: add balwant1707 as a contributor for plugin (#8464) @allcontributors
  • docs: add Cloudieunnie as a contributor for code (#8460) @allcontributors
  • docs: add MAVRICK-1 as a contributor for plugin (#8451) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore(deps): bump form-data from 4.0.3 to 4.0.4 in /packages/pieces/community/scrapeless (#8458) @dependabot
  • chore: show stale data while refreshing analytics overview (#8471) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: made pieces translation get generated only on running a command (#8437) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Cloudieunnie, @Jeremie-Preault, @Louai-Zokerburg, @MAVRICK-1, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrdb, @aryel780, @balwant1707, @danielpoonwj, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @onyedikachi-david, @prasanna2000-max, @ravikiranvm, @sparkybug and @yusuf-cirak

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.5

üß© Pieces

üêû Bug Fixes

üé® Enhancements & Polish

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.66.6
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: agent builder v2 (#8555) @abuaboud
  • feat: ai credits usage table for enterprise (#8552) @amrdb
  • feat: add AI usage feature flag (#8534) @amrdb

üß© Pieces

  • feat(excel-365): added new action to create a workbook (#8548) @Daniel-Klippa
  • fix(subflows): handle failed subflow responses to prevent main flow hanging (#8545) @hazemadelkhalel
  • chore: new translations for sendfox, spotify and date helper (#8522) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat: pdfmonkey (#8481) @Sanket6652

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: import csv dialog not showing up (#8558) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(subflows): handle failed subflow responses to prevent main flow hanging (#8545) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: agent table for sqlite (#8556) @abuaboud
  • fix: router branches with same subflow now return correct outputs for different inputs (#8543) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(ai proxy): utility ai openai moderation requests (#8551) @amrdb
  • fix: disable dropdown cells in tables when user has no permission to write on them (#8541) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: renaming table wasn't working inside the table editor (#8540) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(tables): enrich agent in tables (#8533) @amrdb

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • fix: allow piece to work with api (#8559) @abuaboud
  • feat(pieces): support auth in query params (#8526) @abuaboud
  • chore(deps): bump form-data from 4.0.0 to 4.0.4 (#8501) @dependabot
  • chore: add external id to agent (#8544) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Daniel-Klippa, @Louai-Zokerburg, @Sanket6652, @abuaboud, @amrdb, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr
